title: Blue Archive Tier List
description: Discover the top characters in Blue Archive as of March 2025. Our comprehensive tier list ranks students from S to C Tier, helping you build the ultimate team.
heading: Blue Archive Tier List
introText: Discover the top characters in Blue Archive as of March 2025. Our comprehensive tier list ranks students from S to C Tier, helping you build the ultimate team.

data.itemDescription: A student from Gehenna Academy, Iori wields a sniper rifle and excels in dealing high single-target damage. Her precision and critical hit capabilities make her a formidable attacker
As the leader of Red Winter Federal Academy, Cherino specializes in area-of-effect attacks. Her skills allow her to control the battlefield by debuffing enemies and supporting allies
A tank from Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, Tsubaki is renowned for her exceptional durability. She can absorb significant damage, providing stability to her team during battles
This summer variant of Hoshino from Abydos High School focuses on support roles. She enhances her team's performance by boosting cost recovery and providing sub-tank capabilities

An alternate version of Shiroko from Abydos High School, Shiroko Terror is associated with the Iridescent Vanguard. She wields an assault rifle and possesses abilities linked to her role as a Nameless Goddess
Also known as Hoshino (Combat), this version of Hoshino features enhanced combat capabilities. She can switch between tanking and dealing damage, making her versatile in various combat scenarios

A student from Trinity General School, Mika wields a sniper rifle and is known for her high burst damage. Her skills allow her to deal significant damage to enemies, making her a valuable asset in battles
A special seasonal version of Kayoko Onikata, showcasing her in traditional New Year's attire
A variant of Tomoe sporting a traditional qipao dress, reflecting cultural elegance
Momoi in a maid outfit, highlighting her dedication and service-oriented demeanor
Midori dressed as a maid, complementing her sister Momoi's ensemble, emphasizing their teamwork
A seasonal version of Haruna, adorned in festive New Year's attire, symbolizing celebration
Yuuka in athletic sportswear, showcasing her active and energetic personality

A student from Millennium Science School, Maki is known for her analytical skills and proficiency with firearms, making her a reliable damage dealer in combat situations
Belonging to Trinity General School, Hifumi is a gentle and caring individual who excels in support roles, often boosting her allies' morale and effectiveness on the battlefield
As the strict and disciplined president of Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team, Hina enforces school rules with an iron fist, showcasing exceptional leadership and combat abilities
A member of Gehenna Academy, Haruka is recognized for her calm demeanor and expertise in handling explosives, providing strategic advantages during missions
From Abydos High School, Nonomi is a cheerful and energetic student who wields a machine gun, offering consistent suppressive fire against enemies
A frontline fighter from Gehenna Academy, Tsurugi is known for her aggressive combat style and proficiency with melee weapons, making her a formidable presence in close-quarters battles
An unpredictable student from Gehenna Academy, Junko thrives in chaotic situations, utilizing her unique skill set to disrupt enemy formations
Abydos High School's cool-headed sniper, Shiroko excels in long-range engagements, providing critical support by eliminating high-priority targets from a distance
Hailing from Millennium Science School, Eimi is a tank character known for her high defense and ability to draw enemy attention, protecting her teammates during battles
A diligent student from Millennium Science School, Akari specializes in engineering and technology, often providing technical support and deploying gadgets to assist her team
As a member of Millennium Science School, Akane is a strategic thinker who excels in debuffing enemies, weakening their defenses to give her team an advantage
A ninja from Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, Izuna is characterized by her swift movements and stealth tactics, allowing her to infiltrate enemy lines and execute surprise attacks
The younger twin from Millennium Science School, Midori is an energetic student who, alongside her sister Momoi, specializes in reconnaissance and ranged attacks
The elder twin from Millennium Science School, Momoi complements her sister Midori with her expertise in data analysis and support fire, making them an effective duo
A summer variant of Miyako from Gehenna Academy, showcasing her playful side while maintaining her combat readiness during beach missions

A student from Red Winter Federal Academy, Rumi is known for her disciplined nature and proficiency in defensive strategies, often serving as a reliable protector for her team
Hailing from Trinity General School, Reisa is a talented musician whose melodies provide buffs to allies, enhancing their combat performance
In this maid-themed variant, Arisu from Millennium Science School combines her combat skills with impeccable service, ensuring both battlefield efficiency and team morale
A festive version of Toki from Gehenna Academy, donning a bunny girl outfit that adds flair to her already dynamic combat style
A mysterious student from Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy, Koyuki specializes in illusionary tactics, confusing enemies and creating strategic openings for her allies
Known for her elegance and grace, Sakurano from Trinity General School excels in archery, delivering precise attacks from a distance
A cheerful member of Millennium Science School, Megu is adept at using drones in combat, providing both offensive and reconnaissance support
From Gehenna Academy, Mine is a fiery character who wields flamethrowers, specializing in area-of-effect damage to control the battlefield
